title.value: О влиянии электромагнитных, магнитных и оргонных полей на урожайность и выход семян яровой пшеницы и ячменя
Effect of electromagnetic, magnetic and orgone fields on spring wheat and barley seed yield and efficiency

subject.value: etapas de desarrollo de la planta

journal.title: Arable Farming and Breeding in Belarus : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Gvozdov, A.P., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). Scientific and Practical Center for  Arable Farming
Golovach, A.A., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute of System Studies in Agro - Industrial Complex
Loboda, A.A., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). Scientific and Practical Center for  Arable Farming

abstract.value: In course of the research there was studied the effect of electromagnetic, magnetic and orgone fields on spring wheat (Triticum aestivum) and barley (Hordeum vulgare) seed yield and yielding capacity. The research was realized in the conditions of the Republic of Belarus in the Research and Practical Centre of National Academy of Science of Belarus for Arable Farming in 2011-2012. As a result of realized research it was revealed that application of microwave treatment on spring barley crops variety Mahutny in the phase of the beginning of stem elongation and on spring wheat crops variety Sabina in the phase of tillering made it possible to produce additionally 2.4 q/ha of seeds. Benefit of the introduction of the given method would make up 526.8 thousand Belarusian roubles per hectare. Application of the magnetic field, having intensity 15 mT, and orgone with low activity as for processing of seeds, and vegetative plants did not make it possible to increase authentically productivity and an exit of seeds of spring wheat and barley.
